argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_onsuctop | |- ( A e. On -> suc A e. Top ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eloni | |- ( A e. On -> Ord A ) |
| 3 |  | #P_ordunisuc | |- ( Ord A -> U. suc A = A ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( Ord A -> A = U. suc A ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. On -> A = U. suc A ) |
| 6 |  | #P_istopon | |- ( suc A e. ( TopOn ` A ) <-> ( suc A e. Top /\ A = U. suc A ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 5, 6 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( A e. On -> suc A e. ( TopOn ` A ) ) |
